name: specialist-app.toml

platform.name: ElderCare Specialist
platform.description: Mobile app for specialists to manage orders and track work time

rawContent:
# Specialist Application Platform
# For care specialists managing their work

[platform]
id = "specialist-app"
name = "ElderCare Specialist"
type = "mobile"
description = "Mobile app for specialists to manage orders and track work time"

[platform.config]
baseRoute = "/prototype/specialist"
theme = "light"
primaryAction = "Start Shift"

[platform.features]
core = [
  "View assigned orders",
  "Mark work start/end",
  "Set weekly availability",
  "View shift history"
]
auth = "phone-required"

[platform.navigation]
type = "bottom-nav"
items = [
  { id = "home", icon = "Home", label = "Home" },
  { id = "orders", icon = "ClipboardList", label = "Orders" },
  { id = "availability", icon = "Calendar", label = "Availability" }
]

[relations]
routes = ["specialist-home", "specialist-orders", "active-shift", "availability-setup"]
roles = ["specialist"]
guards = ["authenticated", "specialist-only"]
